segments.text: Could you have a taxi pick me up and take me to the airport before 1 p . m . ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , someone will be there by 12:15 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 2 dollars initially and 35 cents for each quarter mile .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have four very large suitcases . Will those fit in the taxi ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'll send a larger vehicle to pick you up .
segments.speaker: S2
